page.title: 09HARRY WEST LOWER HEATH
page.content: West's is a place where they make {farming machinery.}They don't make tractors,combine harvesters, but they do make{muckspeaders and {trailers.}Mr West started working in 1966 as a{welder}at Rubery Owens.Then he left Rubery Owens a year after and started making machinery on his own.Originally there was a house and some poultry buildings on the site. Mr West makes{Comet Straw Chopper, {Uni Fork,Vortex Spreader, Mixer {Feeder,Dual Spreader, Slurry probe and {the Hi Feeder.}West's machinery is always sprayed{blue.}Mr West has about{55 people}working on and around his buildings.Mr West's factory is {screened by trees}so that you can not see it from the road.Mr West tells people about any new machines by showing them at the Royal Show, the Royal Welsh Show and Smithfield Show.
